tests.sic.sST.det

Class sSTCdetFixedTOpt

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.sic.sST.det.sSTCdetFixedTOpt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptimizerIntf

    public class sSTCdetFixedTOpt
extends java.lang.Object
implements OptimizerIntf
    optimizer class that computes the exact optimal cost for a single-echelon inventory system facing deterministic demand with known and constant demand rate, under a periodic review policy (s,S,T). This is the limit of the normal demands case, when the variance σ tends to zero; in practice, when the variance of the normal distribution becomes small enough, the results of the stochastic and the deterministic system become indistinguishable. Notice the following assumptions:
    • The lead-time is assumed zero.
    • There are no integrality constraints on demand (direct consequence of the constant demand rate). If the demand rate is integral, then on integral review periods, total demand will also be integer.

    Notes:

    • 2020-04-25: added method seParams() (public) because it was moved up from LocalOptimizerIntf to the root OptimizerIntf interface class.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java
